DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the effects of tolvaptan on the size and function of the left heart chamber (ventricle) in patients with congestive heart failure (CHF)
DOC.brief_title: Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo Controlled, Efficacy Study on the Effects of Tolvaptan on Left Ventricular Dilatation in Congestive Heart Failure Patients
